results.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that, during Public Service Recognition Week, public servants should be commended for their dedication and continued service to the United States.
results.short_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that, during Public Service Recognition Week, public servants should be commended for their dedication and continued service to the United States.
results.latest_major_action: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent. (consideration: CR S2728; text: CR S2726-2727)
results.summary: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.) Supports the designation of the week of May 7-May 13, 2017, as Public Service Recognition Week.
results.summary_short: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.) Supports the designation of the week of May 7-May 13, 2017, as Public Service Recognition Week.

actions.description: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent. (consideration: CR S2728; text: CR S2726-2727)
